column2: Month and year retrieved from Census website or date of Census DVD
HTS10 import commodity code or schedule B10 export commodity code
First unit of quantity (see note below)
Second unit of quantity (see note below)
North American Industrial Classification System (1997-current year only)

column3: Agricultural commodities, as determined by the U.S. Department of Agriculture. "0" indicates agricultural commodity; "1" indicates non-agricultural commodity

column1: Note: The first and second units of measurement for quantity data vary from year to year in some cases. Dataweb query results always show the most recent units of measure (and there is no adjustment of past year's quantity data). Care should be taken when interpreting quantity data. To view the units of measure for HTS10 subheadings for both import and export codes by year, go to the "Import concordance" and "Export concordance" sheets, respectively.
